00016 subroutine parse_mols_TNS
00017 use orbitals
00018 use strings
00019 use parameters
00020 use m_mrgrnk
00021 implicit none
00022 integer stat
00023 character(len=100) buf
00024 character*10 buff, bufff
00025 character(len=20) :: FMT, rFMT
00026 character*20 hstr
00027 character*20 out(6)
00028 
00029 real*8, allocatable :: crapbuf(:)
00030 integer, allocatable :: ImolA(:)
00031 integer iorb, i,j, iact
00032 integer nlA, k, nrA, nlB, nrB, nshift, nlD, nrD, nseg, imin, count, cnt
00033 logical CP
00034 
00035 real*8 expo
00036 integer expoint
00037 
00038 integer, external :: get_index
00039 
00040 write(*,*) "TURBOMOLE noSCF"
00041       
00042 ! Open files for parsing
00043 open(10,file="mos", status="old")
00044 !!$open(11,file="../molA/mos", status="old")
00045 !!$open(12,file="../molB/mos", status="old")
00046 !!$
00047 !!$      ! get basis set dimensions for molA
00048 !!$      do
00049 !!$         read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00050 !!$         if (stat /= 0) exit
00051 !!$         if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00052 !!$            read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nA
00053 !!$            exit
00054 !!$         end if
00055 !!$      end do
00056 !!$      rewind(11)
00057 !!$      write(*,*) nA
00058 !!$
00059 !!$      ! get basis set dimensions for molB
00060 !!$      do
00061 !!$         read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00062 !!$         if (stat /= 0) exit
00063 !!$         if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00064 !!$            read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nB
00065 !!$            exit
00066 !!$         end if
00067 !!$      end do
00068 !!$      rewind(12)
00069 !!$      write(*,*) nB
00070 
00071 ! get basis set dimensions for dimer
00072 do
00073    read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00074    if (stat /= 0) exit
00075    if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00076       read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nD
00077       exit
00078    end if
00079 end do
00080 rewind(10)
00081 write(*,*) nD
00082 
00083 
00084 !!$      ! read orbitals from molA
00085 !!$      nAt = 2+homoAsub+lumoAsub
00086 !!$      allocate(molAcoef(nAt,nA), molAener(nAt))
00087 !!$      molAcoef = 0.0d0
00088 !!$      molAener = 0.0d0
00089 !!$      nlA = nA/4
00090 !!$      nrA = nA-nlA*4
00091 !!$      ! read header
00092 !!$      read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00093 !!$      read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00094 !!$      read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00095 !!$      do i = 1, homoA+1+lumoAsub
00096 !!$         if (i .lt. homoA-homoAsub) then
00097 !!$            read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00098 !!$            do j = 1, nlA
00099 !!$               read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00100 !!$            end do
00101 !!$            if (nrA .ne. 0 ) read(11,*) buf
00102 !!$         else
00103 !!$            cnt =0
00104 !!$            iact = i-homoA+homoAsub+1
00105 !!$            read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00106 !!$            if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00107 !!$               read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+16),*) molAener(iact)
00108 !!$            end if
00109 !!$            do j = 1, nlA
00110 !!$               read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00111 !!$               do k = 1, 4
00112 !!$                  cnt = cnt +1
00113 !!$                  read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molAcoef(iact,cnt)
00114 !!$               end do
00115 !!$            end do
00116 !!$            if (nrA .ne. 0 ) then
00117 !!$               read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00118 !!$               do k = 1, nrA
00119 !!$                  cnt = cnt +1
00120 !!$                  read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molAcoef(iact,cnt)
00121 !!$               end do
00122 !!$            end if
00123 !!$         end if
00124 !!$      end do
00125 !!$      close(11)
00126 !!$      molAener = molAener*conv_Hrt_eV
00127 !!$
00128 !!$      ! read orbitals from molA
00129 !!$      nBt = 2+homoBsub+lumoBsub
00130 !!$      allocate(molBcoef(nBt,nB), molBener(nBt))
00131 !!$      molBcoef = 0.0d0
00132 !!$      molBener = 0.0d0
00133 !!$      nlB = nB/4
00134 !!$      nrB = nB-nlB*4
00135 !!$      ! read header
00136 !!$      read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00137 !!$      read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00138 !!$      read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00139 !!$      do i = 1, homoB+1+lumoBsub
00140 !!$         if (i .lt. homoB-homoBsub) then
00141 !!$            read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00142 !!$            do j = 1, nlB
00143 !!$               read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00144 !!$            end do
00145 !!$            if (nrB .ne. 0 ) read(12,*) buf
00146 !!$         else
00147 !!$            cnt =0
00148 !!$            iact = i-homoB+homoBsub+1
00149 !!$            read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00150 !!$            if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00151 !!$               read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+16),*) molBener(iact)
00152 !!$            end if
00153 !!$            do j = 1, nlB
00154 !!$               read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00155 !!$               do k = 1, 4
00156 !!$                  cnt = cnt +1
00157 !!$                  read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molBcoef(iact,cnt)
00158 !!$               end do
00159 !!$            end do
00160 !!$            if (nrB .ne. 0 ) then
00161 !!$               read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00162 !!$               do k = 1, nrB
00163 !!$                  cnt = cnt +1
00164 !!$                  read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molBcoef(iact,cnt)
00165 !!$               end do
00166 !!$            end if
00167 !!$         end if
00168 !!$      end do
00169 !!$      close(12)
00170 !!$      molBener = molBener * conv_Hrt_eV
00171 !!$
00172 
00173 ! read from dimer
00174 allocate( dimcoef(nD,nD), dimen(nD) )
00175 dimcoef   = 0.0d0
00176 nlD = nD/4
00177 nrD = nD-nlD*4  
00178 read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00179 do i = 1, nD
00180    cnt =0
00181    read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00182    if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00183       read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+18),*) dimen(i)
00184       read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+20:index(buf,'ue=')+22),*) expoint
00185       dimen(i) = dimen(i)*10.0d0**dble(expoint)*conv_Hrt_eV
00186    end if
00187    do j = 1, nlD
00188       read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00189       do k = 1, 4
00190          cnt = cnt +1
00191          read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) dimcoef(i,cnt)
00192       end do
00193    end do
00194    if (nrD .ne. 0 ) then
00195       read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00196       do k = 1, nrD
00197          cnt = cnt +1
00198          read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) dimcoef(i,cnt)
00199       end do
00200    end if
00201 end do
00202 close(10)
00203       
00204 ! read overlap matrix from dimer LOG-file (this will be nasty!)
00205 allocate( fock_diag(nD,nD) )
00206 fock_diag = 0.0d0
00207 open(8,file="dimer.out",status='old')
00208 do 
00209    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00210    if (stat /= 0) stop "Error reading Fock matrix."
00211    if ( index(buf,'closed-shell fock matrix') .ne. 0 ) exit 
00212 end do
00213 
00214 nlD = ((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD)/3
00215 nrD = ((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD)-nlD*3  
00216 
00217 
00218 ! Upper diagonal of overlap matrix is stored in ONE (!) single line
00219 allocate(crapbuf((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD  ))
00220 cnt=0
00221 ! rewrite vector into overlap matrix
00222 do i = 1, nlD
00223    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00224    do k = 1, 3
00225       cnt=cnt+1
00226       read( buf( (k-1)*24+5:(k-1)*24+24 ), *) crapbuf(cnt) 
00227    end do
00228 end do
00229 if (nrD .ne. 0 ) then
00230    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00231    do k = 1, nrD
00232       cnt = cnt +1
00233       read( buf( (k-1)*24+5:(k-1)*24+24 ), *) crapbuf(cnt) 
00234    end do
00235 end if
00236 
00237 do i = 1, nD
00238    do j = 1, nD
00239       fock_diag(i,j) = crapbuf(get_index(i,j))
00240    end do
00241 end do
00242 close(8)
00243 fock_diag = fock_diag*conv_Hrt_eV
00244 
00245 
00246 end subroutine parse_mols_TNS
00247 
00248 !!$integer function get_index(i,j)
00249 !!$implicit none
00250 !!$integer i,j, iact, jact, div
00251 !!$
00252 !!$if (j .gt. i ) then
00253 !!$   iact=j
00254 !!$   jact=i
00255 !!$else
00256 !!$   iact = i
00257 !!$   jact =j
00258 !!$end if
00259 !!$
00260 !!$div = iact/2
00261 !!$
00262 !!$if (mod(iact,2).eq.0) then
00263 !!$   get_index = iact*(div-1)+div+jact
00264 !!$else
00265 !!$   get_index = iact*(div)+jact
00266 !!$end if
00267 !!$
00268 !!$end function get_index
00269 
00270 ! bloody different fockmatrix output for dscf...
00271 subroutine parse_mols_DNS
00272 use orbitals
00273 use strings
00274 use parameters
00275 implicit none
00276 integer stat
00277 character(len=100) buf
00278 character*10 buff, bufff
00279 character(len=20) :: FMT, rFMT
00280 character*20 hstr
00281 character*20 out(6)
00282 
00283 real*8, allocatable :: crapbuf(:)
00284 
00285 integer iorb, i,j, iact
00286 integer nlA, k, nrA, nlB, nrB, nshift, nlD, nrD, nseg, imin, count, cnt
00287 logical CP
00288 
00289 real*8 expo
00290 integer expoint
00291 
00292 integer, external :: get_index
00293 
00294 write(*,*) "TURBOMOLE noSCF"
00295       
00296 ! Open files for parsing
00297 open(10,file="mos", status="old")
00298 open(11,file="../molA/mos", status="old")
00299 open(12,file="../molB/mos", status="old")
00300 
00301       ! get basis set dimensions for molA
00302       do
00303          read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00304          if (stat /= 0) exit
00305          if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00306             read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nA
00307             exit
00308          end if
00309       end do
00310       rewind(11)
00311       write(*,*) nA
00312 
00313       ! get basis set dimensions for molB
00314       do
00315          read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00316          if (stat /= 0) exit
00317          if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00318             read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nB
00319             exit
00320          end if
00321       end do
00322       rewind(12)
00323       write(*,*) nB
00324 
00325 ! get basis set dimensions for dimer
00326 do
00327    read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00328    if (stat /= 0) exit
00329    if ( index(buf,'nsaos=') .ne. 0 ) then
00330       read( buf(index(buf,'nsaos=')+6:),*) nD
00331       exit
00332    end if
00333 end do
00334 rewind(10)
00335 write(*,*) nD
00336 
00337 
00338 !!$      ! read orbitals from molA
00339       nAt = 2+homoAsub+lumoAsub
00340       allocate(molAcoef(nAt,nA), molAener(nAt))
00341       molAcoef = 0.0d0
00342       molAener = 0.0d0
00343       nlA = nA/4
00344       nrA = nA-nlA*4
00345       ! read header
00346       read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00347       read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00348       read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00349       do i = 1, homoA+1+lumoAsub
00350          if (i .lt. homoA-homoAsub) then
00351             read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00352             do j = 1, nlA
00353                read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00354             end do
00355             if (nrA .ne. 0 ) read(11,*) buf
00356          else
00357             cnt =0
00358             iact = i-homoA+homoAsub+1
00359             read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00360             if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00361                read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+16),*) molAener(iact)
00362             end if
00363             do j = 1, nlA
00364                read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00365                do k = 1, 4
00366                   cnt = cnt +1
00367                   read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molAcoef(iact,cnt)
00368                end do
00369             end do
00370             if (nrA .ne. 0 ) then
00371                read(11,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00372                do k = 1, nrA
00373                   cnt = cnt +1
00374                   read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molAcoef(iact,cnt)
00375                end do
00376             end if
00377          end if
00378       end do
00379       close(11)
00380       molAener = molAener*conv_Hrt_eV
00381 
00382 
00383       ! read orbitals from molA
00384       nBt = 2+homoBsub+lumoBsub
00385       allocate(molBcoef(nBt,nB), molBener(nBt))
00386       molBcoef = 0.0d0
00387       molBener = 0.0d0
00388       nlB = nB/4
00389       nrB = nB-nlB*4
00390       ! read header
00391       read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00392       read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00393       read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00394       do i = 1, homoB+1+lumoBsub
00395          if (i .lt. homoB-homoBsub) then
00396             read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00397             do j = 1, nlB
00398                read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00399             end do
00400             if (nrB .ne. 0 ) read(12,*) buf
00401          else
00402             cnt =0
00403             iact = i-homoB+homoBsub+1
00404             read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00405             if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00406                read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+16),*) molBener(iact)
00407             end if
00408             do j = 1, nlB
00409                read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00410                do k = 1, 4
00411                   cnt = cnt +1
00412                   read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molBcoef(iact,cnt)
00413                end do
00414             end do
00415             if (nrB .ne. 0 ) then
00416                read(12,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00417                do k = 1, nrB
00418                   cnt = cnt +1
00419                   read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) molBcoef(iact,cnt)
00420                end do
00421             end if
00422          end if
00423       end do
00424       close(12)
00425       molBener = molBener * conv_Hrt_eV
00426 
00427 
00428 ! read from dimer
00429 allocate( dimcoef(nD,nD) )
00430 dimcoef   = 0.0d0
00431 nlD = nD/4
00432 nrD = nD-nlD*4  
00433 read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00434 do i = 1, nD
00435    cnt =0
00436    read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf 
00437 !   if ( index(buf,'ue=') .ne. 0 ) then
00438 !      read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+3:index(buf,'ue=')+18),*) fock_diag(i,i)
00439 !      read( buf(index(buf,'ue=')+20:index(buf,'ue=')+22),*) expoint
00440 !      fock_diag(i,i) = fock_diag(i,i)*10.0d0**dble(expoint)
00441 !   end if
00442    do j = 1, nlD
00443       read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00444       do k = 1, 4
00445          cnt = cnt +1
00446          read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) dimcoef(i,cnt)
00447       end do
00448    end do
00449    if (nrD .ne. 0 ) then
00450       read(10,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00451       do k = 1, nrD
00452          cnt = cnt +1
00453          read( buf((k-1)*20+1:k*20),*) dimcoef(i,cnt)
00454       end do
00455    end if
00456 end do
00457 close(10)
00458       
00459 ! read overlap matrix from dimer LOG-file (this will be nasty!)
00460 allocate( fock_diag(nD,nD) )
00461 fock_diag = 0.0d0
00462 open(8,file="dimer.out",status='old')
00463 do 
00464    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00465    if (stat /= 0) stop "Error reading Fock matrix."
00466    if ( index(buf,'closed-shell fock matrix') .ne. 0 ) exit 
00467 end do
00468 
00469 nlD = ((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD)/4
00470 nrD = ((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD)-nlD*4  
00471 
00472 
00473 ! Upper diagonal of overlap matrix is stored in ONE (!) single line
00474 allocate(crapbuf((nD*nD-nD)/2+nD  ))
00475 cnt=0
00476 ! rewrite vector into overlap matrix
00477 do i = 1, nlD
00478    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00479    do k = 1, 4
00480       cnt=cnt+1
00481       read( buf( (k-1)*25+10:(k-1)*25+25 ), *) crapbuf(cnt) 
00482    end do
00483 end do
00484 if (nrD .ne. 0 ) then
00485    read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00486    do k = 1, nrD
00487       cnt = cnt +1
00488       read( buf( (k-1)*25+10:(k-1)*25+25 ), *) crapbuf(cnt) 
00489    end do
00490 end if
00491 
00492 do i = 1, nD
00493    do j = 1, nD
00494       fock_diag(i,j) = crapbuf(get_index(i,j))
00495    end do
00496 end do
00497 close(8)
00498 fock_diag = fock_diag*conv_Hrt_eV
00499 
00500 
00501 end subroutine parse_mols_DNS
